content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite
inventory=[{"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 29, "index": 12}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 24}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 2, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 35, "index": 40}, {"type": "oak_door", "quantity": 22, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft diorite, I need to place cobblestone and quartz in the crafting grid. The cobblestone is at slot 33, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 29, "index": 12}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 24}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 2, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 35, "index": 40}, {"type": "oak_door", "quantity": 22, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that the cobblestone is in slot 1, I need to move the quartz to slot 2 (to the right of slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 29, "index": 12}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 24}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 35, "index": 40}, {"type": "oak_door", "quantity": 22, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that the cobblestone and quartz are in slots 1 and 2, I need to move the other quartz to slot 4 (below slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 29, "index": 12}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 24}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 35, "index": 40}, {"type": "oak_door", "quantity": 22, "index": 42}]

Ok

TASK: Craft an item of type: diorite
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 29, "index": 12}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 24}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 29, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_fungus_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 35, "index": 40}, {"type": "oak_door", "quantity": 22, "index": 42}]
